005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
009
010import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
011
012/**
013 * Provides a common implementation for all atomic types that have an underlying
014 * value.
015 *
016 * @param <TYPE>
017 *          the Java type associated with the atomic type.
018 */
019public abstract class AbstractAnyAtomicItem<TYPE>
020    extends AbstractAtomicItemBase<TYPE> {
021  @NonNull
022  private final TYPE value;
023
024  /**
025   * Construct a new atomic item using the provided {@code value}.
026   *
027   * @param value
028   *          the value to assign to this atomic item
029   */
030  protected AbstractAnyAtomicItem(@NonNull TYPE value) {
031    this.value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(value, "value");
032  }
033
034  @Override
035  @NonNull
036  public TYPE getValue() {
037    return value;
038  }
039}
